channel.title: Requesting help with running clients and Servers
channel.description: Okay guys.. When i try to run a server I click on run.. Then it says 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Can anybody help me with this error? Thanks alot.

item.description:

I have java downloaded I messed around with the variables, can you tell me what to change them back too?
